name: Keep It Alive! (itch)
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 46 Gamejam.

Theme: Keep it alive!

Instructions:

  • WASD to move
  • E to grab
  • SPACE to use

Intended resolution: 1080x720

Keep your generator alive for as long as you can!

- Turrets (blue boxes): can be placed to defend your generator from the spiders.
- Batteries (yellow): can be used to restore the health of the turrets or the generator. Can also be traded for turrets in the "Vendor" building. Spiders can drop them when dead.
